comment: Thousands of citizens participate in a charged up protest in Mumbai . You don t listen to what they are saying . Many of these youngsters were once your supporters . Instead you pick one poster and blow it out of all proportion . Classic case of missing the woods for the trees .
amr:
# ::snt Thousands of citizens participate in a charged up protest in Mumbai . You don t listen to what they are saying . Many of these youngsters were once your supporters . Instead you pick one poster and blow it out of all proportion . Classic case of missing the woods for the trees .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / participate-01
            :ARG0 (c / citizen
                  :quant (m2 / multiple
                        :op1 1000))
            :ARG1 (p2 / protest-01
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / charge-up-04)
                  :location (c3 / city
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Mumbai"))))
      :snt2 (l / listen-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (s / say-01
                        :ARG0 (t2 / they))))
      :snt3 (p3 / person
            :ARG0-of (s2 / support-01
                  :ARG1 (y2 / you)
                  :time (o / once))
            :domain (y3 / youngster
                  :quant (m3 / many)
                  :mod (t3 / this)))
      :snt4 (ii / instead-of-91
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (p4 / pick-01
                        :ARG0 (y4 / you)
                        :ARG1 (p5 / person
                              :quant 1
                              :ARG0-of (p6 / post-01)))
                  :op2 (b / blow-01
                        :ARG0 y4
                        :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
                        :manner (o2 / out-06
                              :ARG1 ii2
                              :ARG2 (p7 / proportion
                                    :mod (a2 / all)))))
            :snt5 (c4 / case-04
                  :ARG1 (m4 / miss-02
                        :ARG1 (w / woods)
                        :purpose (t4 / tree))
                  :mod (c5 / classic))))

comment: That was not a youngster . She is a professional storyteller who is not a student . It is such idiots who lead to all the violence with these provocative acts . Think before you tweet ! !
